BVR metals 0.1 m
```{r}
metals <- read.csv("https://pasta.lternet.edu/package/data/eml/edi/455/7/e71d70cac1650610e6a3fbbf7928007f")

metals$Date_22 = metals$Date
year(metals$Date_22)=2022
year(metals$Date)[year(metals$Date)==22]<-2022
metals$Year = as.factor(year(metals$Date))

export = metals%>%
  filter(Reservoir == "BVR",
         Depth_m == 0.1,
         Site==50)

write.csv(export,"./Processed_data/Metals at 0.1m.csv",row.names=F)
```
